answers.answer: Meniere's Disease is a troublesome problem which will have symptomatic regression with treatment but has a strong possibility of it coming back over a period of time.Its a problem with the ear's balancing act and the spectra narrated by you fits into it.Tinnitus or Ringing ears is still a problem constantly harassing the ENT surgeon in his practice.There are many remedies from chinese herbs to vestibular sedatives in trying to improve the same.However, there is no one magic medicine which can bring about a complete reversal of the problem of the same.You can try to get her Tinnitus maskers (which can be purchased through the audiologists in practice) and it can help her in dealing with the problem better.The added problems of Diabetes and hypertension only make it worse for getting this symptom under control.You being an Indian, can get in touch with Dr.Anirban Biswas in Kolkata, who has vast experience in this field and has dedicated his entire practice to these kinds of problems.I wish you and your mother the very best and may she be hearing everything except the ringing sound soon.

Hearing loss is a natural consequence of getting older. Our hearing ability worsens from our 30s or 40s & onwards and almost half of people over age of 50 have difficulties understanding speech in noisy situations. And when we reach our 80s, more than 75% of us suffer from a hearing loss.
